org.openlca.core.matrix

Class ParameterTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlca.core.matrix.ParameterTable

  • public class ParameterTable
extends Object
    Contains the parameters of a set of processes or impact assessment methods that can be bound to a formula interpreter which then can be used in calculations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(Collection<ParameterRedef> redefs)
      Applies the given parameter redefinitions to this table.
      static ParameterTable build(IDatabase database, Set<Long> contexts)
      Builds a new parameter table.
      org.openlca.expressions.FormulaInterpreter createInterpreter()
      Creates a new formula interpreter for the parameter values in this table.
      org.openlca.expressions.FormulaInterpreter simulate()
      Calculates new random values for the parameters in this table that have an uncertainty distribution assigned.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public static ParameterTable build(IDatabase database,
                                   Set<Long> contexts)
        Builds a new parameter table. The table contains all global parameters from the given database and the parameters of the processes and LCIA methods with the given IDs.

      • createInterpreter

        public org.openlca.expressions.FormulaInterpreter createInterpreter()
        Creates a new formula interpreter for the parameter values in this table.

      • simulate

        public org.openlca.expressions.FormulaInterpreter simulate()
        Calculates new random values for the parameters in this table that have an uncertainty distribution assigned. The method creates a formula interpreter that is used for the evaluation of the uncertainty parameters and returned with the new values bound. Thus, the returned interpreter can be used in calculations.

      • apply

        public void apply(Collection<ParameterRedef> redefs)
        Applies the given parameter redefinitions to this table. The respective parameter values in this table are overwritten by these redefinitions.
